actions: Breaks up and drives out Blood Stasis, invigorates Blood circulation and knits together sinews and joins bones.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis and alleviates pain.
Dispels Blood Stasis, relieves pain and promotes healing of bones and sinews.
Tonifies Kidney Yang, strengthens and promotes the mending of the sinews and bones and helps regain strength after injuries.
With Xu Duan, for injury to the muscles, sinews and bones by trauma
Tonifies the Liver and Kidneys, strengthens and reconnects the sinews and bones, promotes the movement of Blood, alleviates pain and generates flesh.
With Tu Bie Chong, Zi Ran Tong and Gu Sui Bu, for fractures or severe sprains.
Clears Heat, cools and harmonizes the Blood, invigorates the Blood and dispels Blood Stasis.
Invigorates the Blood and dispels Blood Stasis.
With Ru Xiang, for Blood Stasis causing swelling and pain.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, opens the channels and alleviates pain.
Invigorates the Blood, promotes the movement of Qi, alleviates pain, reduces swelling and generates flesh.
Invigorates the Blood, dissolves Phlegm, resolves Stagnation, softens hardness and dissipates nodules.
Promotes the movement of Blood, invigorates the channels and promotes the healing of incised wounds.
Stops bleeding, invigorates the Blood, transforms Blood Stasis, reduces swelling, alleviates pain and removes extravasated Blood.

contraindications: Contraindicated when there is no Blood Stagnation.

modifications.purpose: pus formation after long-term Blood Stagnation
